name: YIKES, Inc.
description:
YIKES, Inc. web design and development agency builds smart, effective, creative web solutions for businesses and nonprofit organizations. With 20 years of experience, we offer our clients a reliable, effective, savvy team of professionals. 

With an expertise in WordPress, the open-source web software and content management system (CMS) that powers 24% of websites, we specialize in extending WordPress through theme and plugin development that fits the unique needs of each client. YIKES also creates applications with an expertise on big-data, cancer-related web integration. 
Since 1996, YIKES has been a socially responsible business observing the triple bottom line: people, planet, profit. YIKES is a women-owned business and a member and official sponsor of the Sustainable Business Network of Greater Philadelphia. YIKES is also a Certified B Corporation and was named to B Labs "Best for the World - Workers" 2015 list.
